mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary(diaryNum, diaryType, diaryTitle, diaryContent, diaryCreated, userNum) VALUES (#{diaryNum}, #{diaryType}, #{diaryTitle}, #{diaryContent}, SYSDATE, ${userNum})
mapper.select:
SELECT d.diaryNum, d.userNum, nickName, diaryTitle, saveImgName FROM diary d JOIN member1 m ON d.userNum = m.userNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT diaryImgNum, diaryNum, saveImgName FROM ( SELECT diaryImgNum, diaryNum, saveImgName, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY diaryNum ORDER BY diaryImgNum ASC) rank FROM diaryImg ) WHERE rank = 1 ) i ON d.diaryNum = i.diaryNum
ORDER BY diaryNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY

SELECT d.diaryNum, d,userId, nickName, diaryTitle, diaryContent, diaryCreated, NVL(diaryLikeCount, 0) diaryLikeCount FROM diary d JOIN member1 m ON d.userId = m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT diaryNum, COUNT(*) diaryLikeCount FROM diaryLike GROUP BY diaryNum ) dl ON d.diaryNum = dl.diaryNum WHERE d.diaryNum=#{diaryNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diaryImg(diaryImgNum, diaryNum, saveImgName) VALUES (diaryImg_seq.NEXTVAL, #{diaryNum}, #{saveImgName})
